original_text: Now these are the men who came to David at Ziklag, while he could not move about freely because of Saul the son of Kish. And they were among the mighty men who helped him in war.
korean_text: 다윗이 기스의 아들 사울로 말미암아 시글락에 숨어 있을 때에 그에게 와서 싸움을 도운 용사 중에 든 자가 있었으니

sentences.original_text: who came to David at Ziklag
while he could not move about freely
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자유롭게 돌아다닐 수 없었을 때에

sentences.original_text: because of Saul the son of Kish
And they were among the mighty men
